title: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos
text:
Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Toronto Raptors forward Kawhi Leonard celebrates after the Raptors dethroned the Golden State Warriors to win their first NBA title on Thursday, June 13. Leonard was named Finals MVP. Hide Caption 1 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Gary Woodland celebrates on the 18th green after winning the US Open on Sunday, June 16. It is the first major title of his career. Hide Caption 2 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos St. Louis Blues captain Alex Pietrangelo lifts the Stanley Cup after the Blues defeated the Boston Bruins in Game 7 of the Cup Final on Wednesday, June 12. It is the first championship in the Blues' 52-year history. Hide Caption 3 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos US soccer players Alex Morgan, left, and Megan Rapinoe celebrate the team's 12th goal during their 13-0 victory over Thailand on Tuesday, June 11. It was the largest win in World Cup history for any team, men or women. But the team was criticized for the way it celebrated many of its late goals. What's the proper way to celebrate a 13-0 soccer win? Hmm, let's see ... Hide Caption 4 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry reacts after teammate Klay Thompson injured his knee in Game 6 of the NBA Finals on Thursday, June 13. It was later revealed that Thompson tore his ACL. In Game 5, Warriors forward Kevin Durant ruptured his Achilles tendon. Hide Caption 5 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Texas Rangers third baseman Asdrubal Cabrera hangs on a railing after attempting to catch a foul ball during a Major League Baseball game against Oakland Athletics on Sunday, June 9. Hide Caption 6 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Former heavyweight champion Tyson Fury celebrates after his second-round knockout of Tom Schwarz on Saturday, June 15. Hide Caption 7 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Jeff Henderson competes in the long jump during a Diamond League meet in Rabat, Morocco, on Sunday, June 16. Hide Caption 8 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos American soccer player Allie Long jumps over Chile's Daniela Zamora during a Women's World Cup match on Sunday, June 16. Hide Caption 9 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos The Golden State Warriors call a timeout with less than a second to play in Game 6 of the NBA Finals on Thursday, June 13. The Warriors didn't have a timeout, so they were called for a technical foul instead. Hide Caption 10 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Harry Bannister tries to protect himself after falling off Sitron during a hurdles race in Fontwell, England, on Wednesday, June 12. Hide Caption 11 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Tiger Woods plays a shot during the first round of the US Open on Thursday, June 13. The tournament was played at Pebble Beach Golf Links in California. Hide Caption 12 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Toronto's Kawhi Leonard attempts a shot during Game 6 of the NBA Finals on Thursday, June 13. Leonard was named Finals MVP for the second time in his career. He also won with San Antonio in 2014. Hide Caption 13 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Danilo Petrucci and Andrea Dovizioso ride during a MotoGP practice session in Barcelona, Spain, on Saturday, June 15. Hide Caption 14 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Italy's Aurora Galli, left, and Jamaica's Deneisha Blackwood chase down a ball during a World Cup match on Friday, June 14. Hide Caption 15 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos A member of the Cincinnati Reds' grounds crew loses his gum bubble on Friday, June 14. Hide Caption 16 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Thailand's Alongkorn, top, competes against Malaysia's Muhammad Noraizat Binmohd Nordin during a sepak takraw match in Kunming, China, on Wednesday, June 12. Hide Caption 17 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos St. Louis Blues goalie Jordan Binnington celebrates with fans during the Blues' Stanley Cup victory parade on Saturday, June 15. Hide Caption 18 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Portugal star Cristiano Ronaldo heads the ball during the Nations League final on Sunday, June 9. Portugal defeated the Netherlands 1-0. Hide Caption 19 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Seattle's Dee Gordon steals second base ahead of the tag from Oakland's Marcus Semien on Friday, June 14. Hide Caption 20 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos British canoeist Adam Burgess competes in a World Cup event in Lee Valley, England, on Saturday, June 15. Hide Caption 21 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos The Melbourne Storm's Joe Stimson scores a try during a rugby match against the Newcastle Knights on Saturday, June 15. Hide Caption 22 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Toronto Raptors guard Jeremy Lin celebrates after the Raptors won the NBA title on Thursday, June 13. Lin is now the first Asian American to ever to be crowned an NBA champ. Hide Caption 23 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Kosovo's Vedat Muriqi heads the ball over Bulgaria's Anton Nedyalkov during a Euro 2020 qualifier on Monday, June 10. Hide Caption 24 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Desirae Krawczyk and Giuliana Olmos celebrate after winning the Nature Valley Open doubles title on Sunday, June 16. The tennis tournament took place in Nottingham, England. Hide Caption 25 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos The car of drag racer Jeremy Ray flips over after crashing into a wall in Topeka, Kansas, on Sunday, June 9. Ray was uninjured. Hide Caption 26 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Sweden's Lina Hurtig celebrates after scoring her team's fourth goal against Thailand during the Women's World Cup on Sunday, June 16. Sweden won 5-1. Hide Caption 27 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos A Colombia soccer fan shows off his haircut before a Copa America match on Saturday, June 15. Hide Caption 28 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Boston's Brandon Carlo, bottom, is checked by St. Louis' Oskar Sundqvist during Game 7 of the Stanley Cup Final on Wednesday, June 12. Hide Caption 29 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos India's Shikhar Dhawan plays a shot against Australia during the Cricket World Cup on Sunday, June 9. The tournament is taking place in England and Wales. Hide Caption 30 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Atlanta's Ozzie Albies and Ronald Acuna Jr. celebrate after a win over Pittsburgh on Thursday, June 13. Hide Caption 31 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos West Indies cricketer Shimron Hetmyer ducks to avoid a bouncer during a World Cup match against England on Friday, June 14. Hide Caption 32 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Belgian forward Eden Hazard kisses the ball as he is revealed as Real Madrid's newest signing on Thursday, June 13. Madrid acquired the 28-year-old playmaker from Chelsea. Hide Caption 33 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Houston's Jack Mayfield slides safely into second base, beating the tag of Toronto's Eric Sogard on Saturday, June 15. Hide Caption 34 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Jordan Spieth plays a shot during the first round of the US Open on Thursday, June 13. Hide Caption 35 of 37

Photos: What a shot! 37 amazing sports photos Spanish midfielder Virginia Torrecilla tackles Germany's Sara Dabritz during a World Cup match in Valenciennes, France, on Wednesday, June 12. Hide Caption 36 of 37
description: Take a look at 37 amazing sports photos from June 9 to June 16.
